ModMetaData.name: Down For Me
ModMetaData.author: aRandomKiwi
ModMetaData.description:
Allow your pawn to pretend to be downed.
No more wounded pawn with slow moving that will need too much time to reach nearest medical unit. Now you can set them down and take care of them, without having to punch them until they are knocked out ;)
Version <color=#FFD800>1.0.7</color> for Rimworld.
